awd_titl_txt: Proposal to Support Faculty Foreign Travel to Germany,      Summer 1991
awd_abstract_narration: Dr. McGrath has been instrumental in developing international                   cooperation in chemical engineering between Michigan State                      University and RWTH-Achen, as well as other institutions in                     Germany.  This visit will enable to further this effort and                     open new windows of opportunity for international                               collaboration in research by meeting key individuals and                        familiarizing himself with the key German institutions.  The                    utility of this effort is further enhanced by coordinating                      this trip with the visits of Dr. R. Wellek of NSF and Dr.                       Anderson of MSU.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
